blogPost.excerpt: Each roll comes with a physical display, so you can hang your NFTP in your bathroom alongside your IRL rolls. All proceeds will be donated to Direct Relief, to improve the lives of people impacted by poverty or emergency situations around the world.

localize.description: 每一卷都有实物展示，所以你可以把你的NFTP和你的IRL卷挂在浴室里。所有收益将捐给直接救济组织，用于改善世界各地受贫困或紧急情况影响的人们的生活。
